name: Sherlock_Holmes
description: Consulting detective known for a proficiency with observation, forensic science, and logical reasoning.

name: Dr_Watson
description: Sherlock Holmes's friend and partner. Watson narrates the stories and acts as something like Holmes's biographer.

name: John_Turner
description: Elderly man from Australia who has established a fine estate in England.

name: Miss_Turner
description: John Turner's daughter and James McCarthy's beloved.

name: Charles_McCarthy
description: A fellow Australian and a murder victim in this mystery.

name: James_McCarthy
description: Charles McCarthy's son and suspect in his murder.
